infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to document construction progress and capture project photos with location data.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location services to automatically tag photos with GPS coordinates for project documentation.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses the photo library to import existing construction photos with metadata.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record voice notes with construction photos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow ConstructPro Retro to use the camera for project documentation.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ConstructPro Retro to use location services to tag photos with GPS coordinates.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow ConstructPro Retro to access photos for project documentation.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow ConstructPro Retro to save construction photos to your device.
